#bitcoin-core-dev Meeting: abubakarsadiq achow101 _aj_ ajonas b10c brunoerg cfields darosior dergoegge fanquake fjahr furszy gleb glozow hebasto hodlinator instagibbs jarolrod jonatack josibake kanzure laanwj LarryRuane lightlike luke-jr maflcko marcofleon maxedw Murch pinheadmz provoostenator ryanofsky sdaftuar S3RK stickies-v sipa sr_gi tdb3 theStack TheCharlatan vasild willcl-ark
hi
hi
hi
hi
hi
There are no pre-proposed meeting topics this week. Any last minute ones to add?
hi
hi
#topic Stratum v2 WG Update (sjors)
hi
hi
Could use more review ack on
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31802 | Add bitcoin-{node,gui} to release binaries for IPC by Sjors · Pull Request #31802 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31679 | cmake: Move internal binaries from bin/ to libexec/ by ryanofsky · Pull Request #31679 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
* review or ack
31679 needs review from people involved in build systems
hello
They're technically independent
But it's better if they both go (in v30)
Because moving binaries around later isn't great.
And it's less confusing if the two new binaries are not in PATH.
#topic MuSig2 WG Update (achow101)
The reason for two new binaries is to avoid adding multiprocess as a dependency to bitcoind and bitcoin-qt for now.
No changes since last, #31244 is still probably rfm.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31244 | descriptors: MuSig2 by achow101 · Pull Request #31244 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
#topic orphan resolution WG Update (glozow)
I've been doing a bunch of testing with musig2, including against ledger.
Will try to catch up on code review there too.
#31829 was merged (yay!!!!) so now working on the followups in #32941
This pretty much wraps up orphan resolution (I've updated https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/%5BP2P%5D-known-TxOrphanage-problems)
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/31829 | p2p: improve TxOrphanage denial of service bounds by glozow · Pull Request #31829 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/32941 | p2p: TxOrphanage revamp cleanups by glozow · Pull Request #32941 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
After the followups I think we can go back to package validation (and then bip331)
that's all
#topic QML GUI WG Update (jarolrod, johnny9dev)
id like to be..ask for review on #32885
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/32885 | Cache m_cached_finished_ibd where SetTip is called. by pstratem · Pull Request #32885 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
- pinheadmz's PR to add bitcoin submodule building with Qt6 was approved and merged into the qt6 branch. (bitcoin-core/gui-qml#475)
- hebasto has switch the default branch of the project to the 'qt6' branch
- I have started adding additional fixes and migrating my previous work over to the new branch
that is all for now
https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui-qml/issues/475 | Add cmake, qt6, and bitcoin core submodule by pinheadmz · Pull Request #475 · bitcoin-core/gui-qml · GitHub
#topic Script Validation WG Update (fjahr)

The secp PR has been rebased now secp#1134, it’s still missing pippenger usage but that’s in the works and review is welcome on the current state of the PR if anyone is interested to look over there. The batch PR for core has been updated with that latest code now.
fjahr: Error: That URL raised <HTTP Error 404: Not Found>
That’s it.
https://github.com/bitcoin-core/secp256k1/issues/1134 | Add an experimental batch module by siv2r · Pull Request #1134 · bitcoin-core/secp256k1 · GitHub
Any other topics to discuss this week?
#endmeeting
